headline: Masco Corporation to Participate in Fireside Chat at Investor Conference
summary: LIVONIA, Mich., February 12, 2025--Masco Corporation (NYSE: MAS) announced today that Rick Westenberg, Vice President, Chief Financial Officer, will participate in a live fireside chat at the Barclays 42nd Annual Industrial Select Conference in Miami, Florida on Thursday, February 20, 2025, at 10:25 a.m. ET.

headline: Masco Corp (MAS) Q4 2024 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Margin Growth Amid Revenue Challenges
summary: Masco Corp (MAS) reports a 7% EPS increase and improved operating margins despite a slight revenue decline due to strategic divestitures.
